name: Zapier
description: Automation glue. Connects apps like a nervous system.
wildUse: Build a 'lead-to-cash' conveyor belt that auto-qualifies, follows up, invoices, and books calls while you sleep.

name: Notion
description: Your ops brain in one place. Docs, databases, dashboards.
wildUse: Turn it into a client-facing 'command center' that makes you look like a 20-person team.

name: Cloudflare Pages
wildUse: Ship micro-sites for every offer angle you test, then kill the losers and scale the winners in hours.

name: Make
wildUse: Chain 15 APIs together to build a complete SaaS backend without writing a single line of code.

name: Airtable
wildUse: Serve as the central brain and content repository for a fully programmatic SEO agency.

name: OpenAI
wildUse: Pass it raw customer support transcripts to automatically identify churn risks and issue partial refunds before they cancel.

name: Anthropic
wildUse: Feed it a 100-page industry PDF and have it autonomously draft 50 unique, highly-contextual LinkedIn posts.

name: ElevenLabs
wildUse: Hook it to your newsletter to automatically generate a personalized daily podcast payload for premium subscribers.

name: HeyGen
description: AI Avatars that don't look like garbage.
wildUse: Programmatically generate personalized welcome videos saying the name of every new Stripe customer.

name: Vapi
wildUse: Replace your entire level-1 support team with an agent that answers within 1 second and handles 90% of basic inquiries.

name: Stripe
wildUse: Auto-split revenue between 5 different affiliate partners the exact millisecond a customer charge goes through.

name: Kit
wildUse: Trigger a hyper-personalized 14-day sequence the moment someone visits a specific pricing tier on your site.

name: Webflow
wildUse: Pipe CMS data directly from Airtable to generate 10,000 programmatic SEO landing pages perfectly formatted overnight.

name: Midjourney
wildUse: Automate an entire faceless Instagram account's visual pipeline with zero human input by triggering Discord bots via API.

name: Perplexity
wildUse: Automatically scrape and summarize your competitor's new feature drops into a daily Slack intelligence alert.

name: Retell AI
wildUse: Build an inbound sales closer that handles objections faster and with better tonality than a human rep.

name: Bland AI
wildUse: Dial every abandoned cart user with a custom discount offer in real-time before they leave the site.

name: Bubble
wildUse: Launch a fully functional two-sided marketplace in a single weekend and start charging MRR.

name: Framer
wildUse: Build a high-converting landing page, test it with live traffic, and pivot the entire design system in under 24 hours.

name: Phantombuster
wildUse: Pull 5,000 highly targeted LinkedIn profiles and feed them directly into your cold outreach engine automatically.

name: Apify
wildUse: Monitor 50 competitor pricing pages daily and dynamically adjust your own Stripe checkout prices to match.

name: Instantly
wildUse: Spin up 50 domains and send 10,000 hyper-personalized emails a day with zero deliverability issues.

name: Claude
wildUse: Analyze massive datasets of failed sales calls to generate a perfect, probabilistically-optimized objection handling script.

name: Twilio
wildUse: Build a rogue SMS bot that automatically detects when your internet drops and negotiates credit with your ISP.

name: GitHub
wildUse: Automatically deploy new front-end features to Cloudflare the exact second you push an LLM-generated script.
